FuncDef:
The locality command sets the name of the locality where the entity resides.
The undo locality command deletes the name of the locality where the entity resides.
By default, no locality name exists for the entity.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the name of the locality where the entity resides.
It is a string of 1 to 31 case sensitive characters. Except the question mark (?) and space. However, when double quotation marks (") are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
locality-name is used to describe an entity.
